title: How to Build a Spinning Ride Using the Starter Kit (Roblox)

steps.headline: Go to your Start Menu > All Programs > Roblox > Roblox Studio > Then Open your place in "Edit" Mode.
Insert the Free Starter Kit you just got by going to The tools icon in the Top left corner of  the game > Drop Down Arrow: My Models > Then Insert the Kit.
Start building!
steps.description: First Click and Drag the Blue brick with the Hinge (Yellow Thing) in the middle of it; Place it where ever you want. This is your starting piece.

steps.headline: Locate the long white rectangle brick, this will be the Support of the ride.
steps.description: Drag the rectangle brick and put it on top of the first Blue brick you placed.

steps.headline: Get the skinny white brick and place it, horizontally, on top of the white Support Brick.
steps.description: These will be called the Arms. The Arms will be the pieces that support the seats. Do the same thing with the other skinny rectangle brick, but this time on the other side of the previous one. It Should look like this.

steps.headline: Locate the Skinny, Tall, Blue brick that standing up vertically.
steps.description: Drag this piece and palace it UNDER one of the "Arm" bricks that you connected in the last step. Like so...  And again to the other side. Right under the other "Arm".

steps.headline: Find the White Square brick and place it under the skinny blue brick you connected in the last step.
steps.description: This is going to be the Chair. A Robloxian Character needs somewhere to sit when on the ride. Once again, repeat the last step to the other side, under the Skinny Blue rectangle brick you placed.

steps.headline: For this step, you are going to make the support that holds up the Seat.
steps.description: Locate and Drag the Small and Blue, Skinny, Rectangle brick and place it under the White Square brick you connected in the previous step. Do the same to the other side with the other brick just like the one you just connected in this step.

steps.headline: Find the Blue, Square brick that is laying face down and place it on the side/front of the Brick you placed in the previous step (The small, skinny, rectangular blue brick you placed).
steps.description: Do this to the other side as well. Use CTRL+C and CTRL+V to make another copy of the brick if there is not already a second one to use.

steps.headline: Last Step!
steps.description: For this step, Click the remaining skinny white brick (The Seat) > CTRL+C > Then CTRL+V to make a copy of this brick. Now, place this brick on top of the Blue Square Brick you placed in the last step (This is where you sit to ride the ride!) Repeat. Do the same with the other similar brick (The one that you Copied and Pasted) and place it on the other seat.

steps.headline: Optional (Continued Step): Click and Hold your mouse and then Drag it over the creation you just made until all the pieces connected to it are highlighted blue.
steps.description: Then, Press and Hold CTRL+G to group it all together!

steps.headline: Go to your place and test out your ride!

text: Go to your Start Menu > All Programs > Roblox > Roblox Studio > Then Open your place in "Edit" Mode.  Insert the Free Starter Kit you just got by going to The tools icon in the Top left corner of  the game > Drop Down Arrow: My Models > Then Insert the Kit.  Start building! First Click and Drag the Blue brick with the Hinge (Yellow Thing) in the middle of it; Place it where ever you want. This is your starting piece. Locate the long white rectangle brick, this will be the Support of the ride. Drag the rectangle brick and put it on top of the first Blue brick you placed. Get the skinny white brick and place it, horizontally, on top of the white Support Brick. These will be called the Arms. The Arms will be the pieces that support the seats. Do the same thing with the other skinny rectangle brick, but this time on the other side of the previous one. It Should look like this. Locate the Skinny, Tall, Blue brick that standing up vertically. Drag this piece and palace it UNDER one of the "Arm" bricks that you connected in the last step. Like so...  And again to the other side. Right under the other "Arm". Find the White Square brick and place it under the skinny blue brick you connected in the last step. This is going to be the Chair. A Robloxian Character needs somewhere to sit when on the ride. Once again, repeat the last step to the other side, under the Skinny Blue rectangle brick you placed. For this step, you are going to make the support that holds up the Seat. Locate and Drag the Small and Blue, Skinny, Rectangle brick and place it under the White Square brick you connected in the previous step. Do the same to the other side with the other brick just like the one you just connected in this step. Find the Blue, Square brick that is laying face down and place it on the side/front of the Brick you placed in the previous step (The small, skinny, rectangular blue brick you placed). Do this to the other side as well. Use CTRL+C and CTRL+V to make another copy of the brick if there is not already a second one to use. Last Step! For this step, Click the remaining skinny white brick (The Seat) > CTRL+C > Then CTRL+V to make a copy of this brick. Now, place this brick on top of the Blue Square Brick you placed in the last step (This is where you sit to ride the ride!) Repeat. Do the same with the other similar brick (The one that you Copied and Pasted) and place it on the other seat. Optional (Continued Step): Click and Hold your mouse and then Drag it over the creation you just made until all the pieces connected to it are highlighted blue. Then, Press and Hold CTRL+G to group it all together! Go to your place and test out your ride!
